mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_master (order_id,buyer_name, buyer_phone, order_amount, status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) VALUES (#{orderId},#{buyerName}, #{buyerPhone}, #{orderAmount}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser})
